location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter relates to payments made to Mohummed Nebbe Khan [Muhammad Nabi Khan, former Governor of Bushire]'s agent in Calcutta [Kolkata]. William Bruce responds to a Government command from 19 April 1814, which asked him to explain certain details such as why the agent in Calcutta was paid for a sum that had already been paid to Mohummed Nebbe Khan.
